## WidgetDiv.testOnly\_setDiv() function

Allows unit tests to reset the div.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function testOnly_setDiv(newDiv: HTMLDivElement | null): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  newDiv | HTMLDivElement \| null | The new value for the DIV field. |
